title: League not updating!
body: Since the new update I have not been able to access LOL since everytime I download the update it gets to 33% and goes on forever with the files scanned It usually reaches about 6000 files scanned then I try again but It never loads.  I would any helps thanks ;)

replies.body:
Hey there,

While the patcher may seem like it's simply doing nothing while "scanning files" please allow it to complete, if after a period of time you receive an error message along the lines of "An unspecified error has occurred" you may want to try the following.

Navigate to:

> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln

and delete the contents of the folder. Re-run the client. This'll force a repatch.

If that didn't work, try navigating to:

> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\filearchive

and deleting the filearchive folder. Re-run the client to force a repatch.
